did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: U.S. Commission on Industrial Relations on Microfilm, 1912-1915
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Microfilm copy of the reports in the Library of the Wisconsin State Historical Society and the Shelf list of the Reports of the Commission.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The Commission on Industrial Relations was a commission created by the U.S. Congress on August 23, 1912. The commission studied work conditions throughout the industrial United States between 1913 and 1915.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Microfilm copy of the reports in the Library of the Wisconsin State Historical Society and the Shelf list of the Reports of the Commission.
Reports of the Commission and reports of investigations made for the Commission.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: United States. Commission on Industrial Relations.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: U.S. Commission on Industrial Relations on Microfilm #5398 mf. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
